name: Bad Romance: A Down City Love Story
name_original: Bad Romance: A Down City Love Story
description:
A Dragon Booster love story between Wyrd and the leader of the Dragon Eyes, Zulay. 

--

This is a Visual Novel Commission for Musa_gKing.

If you would like to commission us to make a VN for you, please click here!

--

Due to server issues, the game might be slow when playing with browser.
If the browser version of the game is too slow, please download the .zip file to play it on your device.

You may NOT reproduce, distribute, reupload or modify this VN.
